message.content: {"id": "24411", "title": "Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link", "description": "Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link", "OB": "When restarting with build 20021001, a welcome page appears. After removing the welcome page from the prefstore.ini file of the workbench metadata, clicking on any link in the welcome page executes the appropriate action, but the clicked link is not visually selected when returning to the welcome page. This inconsistency should be resolved by making sure that links are selected when clicked, providing more context to the user when they return to the welcome page. The ProductInfoDialog dialog already implements this functionality.", "EB": "There is currently no error or unexpected behavior to report.", "SR": "Implement the functionality to select links when clicked in the welcome page to provide consistent visual feedback to the user."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '24411', 'title': 'Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link', 'description': 'Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link ', 'OB': 'build 20021001make sure you get a welcome page when you restart (I remove the welcome...line in prefstore.ini of the workbench metadata)click on any link in the welcome pagethe appropriate action is executed but the clicked link is not selected whenyou return to the welcome pageIt would be nice if links were selected when clicked to provide more contextto the user when he returns to the welcome page. The ProductInfoDialog dialogdoes this now. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': ''}
